law.text: An accused may be found guilty of an offense necessarily included in the offense charged or of an attempt to commit either the offense charged or an offense necessarily included therein.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 83, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 57. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 88, effective July 1, 1954.
